explication: This is the mother tongue. The person has complete understanding and perfect fluency, capable of communicating effectively, with nuance, and effortlessly in any context, including professional and academic settings.
This level indicates the ability to communicate in English in a limited manner. The person can understand and use basic phrases and expressions but may struggle with more complex language.
This level signifies a basic understanding of Italian. The person can communicate simple ideas and understand basic conversations but lacks fluency.
This level signifies a basic understanding of Russian. The person can communicate simple ideas and understand basic conversations but lacks fluency.
